entityId.localType: Christian Brothers Oceania Province Archive Series Number

biogHist.abstract: This series contains records from the Christain Brothers including: registers which record religious ceremonies, participation, membership by students. These records are limited to very specific times and groups of students. There are significant gaps in the three volumes of this collection, and some information about some people may be missing.
biogHist.p: People (and their relations) who spent time in 'care' with the Christian Brothers will generally be able to access or obtain a copy of records relating to their (or their relations) time in 'care'. To protect the privacy of people who spent time in 'care' the Christian Brothers may request proof of identity or relation in some circumstances before access to records or copies of records will be provided. In some cases original documents will be made available.
The Christian Brothers Baptism and Confirmation Registers series includes the following items:

list.item: Baptism registers for child migrants who arrived at Castledare in 1947
Baptism registers for child migrants who arrived at Clontarf in 1947
Confirmation register for Clontarf for the years 1949 to 1977. This includes the name, confirmation name and date, and sponsor's name
Baptism registers for child migrants who arrived at Bindoon in 1947
Baptism registers for child migrants who arrived at Tardun in 1947

biogHist.p: Baptism registers may contain name, date of baptism, names of parents, place of origin before immigration, and place of baptism. There are notes relating to birth certificates for many boys.

cpfRelation.relationEntry: Christian Brothers Oceania Province Regional Collection (1888 - )

resourceRelation.relationEntry: 'Religious Registers', in Find & Connect - Western Australia,
